programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: June 4, 1944: Uppottery, England. After high winds and poor visibility postpone the Allied invasion of Normandy, Lts Richard Winters and Lewis Nixon reflect on the events that led them to the brink of D-Day.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: June 4, 1944: Uppottery, England. After high winds and poor visibility postpone the Allied invasion of Normandy, Lts Richard Winters and Lewis Nixon reflect on the events that led them to the brink of D-Day.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: Landing in a field, Winters finds he has lost his rifle and supply bag. He teams up with a private from another company, John Hall, and sets out to find their units. During the night they link up with a few more soldiers, and ambush a horse-drawn German supply convoy, their first enemy encounter. Regrouping in a nearby town, Winters runs into Easy's Lt. 'Buck' Compton, who tells him that Lt. Meehan is unaccounted for, which puts Winters in charge. His orders are to lead an attack on a nearby cluster of German artillery pieces endangering the seaborne infantry at Utah Beach. Winters deploys a small group on the entrenched enemy positions, and eventually takes four artillery pieces in succession, disabling them with TNT. The euphoria is tempered, however, when Winters finds Hall dead, killed by machine-gun fire. The mission is successful, but Winters has lost his first man as acting company commander.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: The true story of the highly trained Marines of First Recon Battalion during the first 40 days of the Iraq war, detailing their experiences on the front line.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Along with the rest of First Marine Division, Bravo busts north towards Nasiriyah, where their sister company Alpha gets its first taste of combat.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Having survived its first trial by fire, Bravo scopes out a roadside hamlet but the company watches in horror and disbelief as a regimental combat team arrives with guns firing and obliterates the hamlet.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Alpha is asked to recover the body of a captured Marine who was murdered in Ah Shatra. Their mission takes a twist when a CIA-trained army of Iraqi Freedom Fighters arrives and then just as quickly departs.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: The men of Bravo are frustrated by the capricious nature of the war and the actions of the higher-ups are getting harder to defend.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Captain America is over eager in his attempts to subdue a prisoner, while his men's growing disillusionment with his command is growing more apparent.

programme.title: Generation Kill
programme.desc: Bravo reaches Baghdad and is shocked by the sheer size and scope of the city. They set up shop in an abandoned cigarette factory with a chance to rest for a bit.

programme.title: The Craft
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Fairuza Balk and Robin Tunney star in this teen thriller about four private school misfits who form a coven to summon the dark forces they need to wreak havoc on their persecutors. Having just moved to Los Angeles, Sarah (Tunney) is an outsider at St. Benedict's Academy until she meets three other social outcasts. Nancy (Balk), Bonnie (ampbell) and Rochelle (Rachel True) will never fit in with the "in" crowd. Nancy, Bonnie and Rochelle dabble in the occult, and when they notice Sarah has the powers of a natural witch, they talk her into joining their coven. With the addition of a fourth witch they find they can cast spells they couldn't before, and the teenage witches are suddenly not only able to get the attention, praise and love they have long been denied, but also to exact vengeance on classmates, parents and boyfriends. They learn, however, that everything comes with a price. Support cast includes Skeet Ulrich and Rachel True.

programme.title: Drop Dead Fred
programme.desc: Every kid has an imaginary friend. Only Elizabeth isnt a kid and Drop Dead Fred is anything but imaginary. With a haircut this bad, he has to be real - and his mischief has Elizabeth in big trouble. When she splits with her husband, Elizabeth turns to her best friend. But it's her mum who sends her back home where she discovers her childhood friend, Fred. Having been locked in a box for 21 years, Fred is bursting with energy to turn Elizabeth's life into a rowdy, rollicking, racy adventure.

Accordingly, and against his doctor's advice, Frank sets out on a cross-country road trip via bus and train to pay surprise visits to all of them.

programme.title: The Gathering Storm
programme.desc: Winston Churchill's wilderness years prior to World War II, when only he could see the threat that Adolf Hitler and a rearmed Germany posed to Europe.

programme.title: Indictment: The McMartin Trial
programme.desc: A fact-based drama based on the longest and most expensive trial in American history that ended without a single conviction.

programme.title: Indictment: The McMartin Trial

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hanna is a teenage girl. Uniquely, she has the strength, the stamina, and the smarts of a soldier; these come from being raised by her father, an ex-CIA man, in the wilds of Finland. Living a life unlike any other teenager, her upbringing and training have been one and the same, all geared to making her the perfect assassin. The turning point in her adolescence is a sharp one; sent into the world by her father on a mission, Hanna journeys stealthily across Europe while eluding agents dispatched after her by a ruthless intelligence operative with secrets of her own. As she nears her ultimate target, Hanna faces startling revelations about her existence and unexpected questions about her humanity.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Corporate salesman Steve Butler (Damon) has been dispatched to the rural town of McKinley with his sales partner (Frances McDormand) to offer much-needed relief to the economically hard-hit residents in exchange for drilling rights to their properties. What seems like an easy job for the duo quickly becomes complicated by a respected schoolteacher (Hal Holbrook), a slick environmental activist (Krasinski), and Steve's interest in a local woman (Rosemarie DeWitt). As they grapple with a surprising array of both open hearts and closed doors, the outsiders soon discover the strength of an American small town at a crossroads.

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This big screen version of the Broadway musical tells the story of the four young men from the wrong side of the tracks in New Jersey who came together to form the iconic '60s rock group The Four Seasons. Their trials and triumphs are accompanied by the hit songs that influenced a generation and are now being embraced by a new generation of fans through the stage musical.

programme.title: Se7en
programme.desc: Two cops track a brilliant and elusive killer who orchestrates a string of horrific murders.

programme.title: About Schmidt
programme.desc: Warren Schmidt, an embittered man who has just retired after 32 years as an insurance company actuary, is about to taste a not-so-sweet slice of life.

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: The true story of George Jung, who moved a mountain of cocaine into the USA for Carlos Escobar's Medellin cartel, made $100 million, wound up doing 15 years in jail and blew the lot.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: Just released from prison, all Rudy Duncan wants is to start a new life with Ashley, the girl of his dreams, whom he met through pen pal letters in prison. But between them and happiness stands her crazy brother, Gabriel, and his motley crew of deadly criminals who think Rudy has some inside information about a casino where he once had a job, a casino Gabriel and his short-fused posse plan to take down. Now, just as Rudy is beginning his new life, he's caught in a high-velocity avalanche of temptations and surprises that could bury him, unless he can artfully dodge them.

programme.desc: In the mid 1960s, President Lyndon B Johnson and his foreign-policy team debate the decision to withdraw from or escalate the war in Vietnam.

programme.title: Seven Years in Tibet
programme.desc: The true story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet. Based on the book Seven Years in Tibet written by Austrian mountaineer Heinrich Harrer on his experiences in Tibet between 1944 and 1951 during the Second World War. The score was composed by John Williams.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Stranded 205,000 miles from Earth in a crippled spacecraft, astronauts Jim Lovell, Fred Haise and Jack Swigert fight a desperate battle to survive. Meanwhile, at Mission Control, astronaut Ken Mattingly, flight director Gene Kranz and a heroic ground crew race against time - and the odds - to bring them home.

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: Michael Oher knows little about family. Less about football. What the homeless teen knows are the streets and projects of Memphis. Well-to-do Leigh Anne Tuohy knows little about his world. Yet when she and Michael meet, he's found a home. And the Tuohys have found something just as life-changing, a beloved new son and brother. This real-life story of family and of Michael's growth into a blue-chip football star will have you cheering with its mix of gridiron action and heartwarming emotion. Share the remarkable journey of the college all-American and first-round NFL draft pick who was a winner before he ever stepped onto the playing field.

programme.desc: An antisocial, obsessive-compulsive writer, a single mother and a gay artist become unlikely friends in this perfect comedy-drama.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens discover video feeds of classic arcade games and misinterpret them as a declaration of war, they attack the Earth, using the video games as models for their assaults.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy doesn't just play golf, he destroys it. With the help of a retired golfer and hot publicist, can Happy perfect his game and tame his temper to win the tournament prize money?

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: Donny is a single parent, who, after years of not seeing Todd, resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: Five high school pals reunite after 30 years at a July Fourth celebration and wrestle with the challenges of adulthood. No one wants to be the grown-up of the gang.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Welcome to the Hotel Transylvania. Dracula, who runs a five-stake resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the count's daughter.

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: It's 1985 and Adam Sandler is Robbie Hart, the ultimate master of ceremonies, until he is left at the altar at his own wedding.

programme.title: Just Go with It
programme.desc: Danny Maccabee meets the girl of his dreams but has to ask his loyal assistant to pretend to be his soon-to-be ex-wife in order to cover up a lie.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: A 27-year-old spoiled brat must repeat all 12 grades of school - in just 24 weeks - to earn his father's respect and prove he can run the family's multimillion-dollar empire.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, Sonny Koufax is a carefree slob trying to save his love life by becoming responsible. He gets the chance when a cute kid turns up needing a father.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry
programme.desc: Two firefighters become domestic partners and must carry the masquerade to extremes when an overzealous bureaucrat becomes suspicious of their true relationship.

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan refuses to retire, two of his heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office.

programme.title: Dragonheart: Vengeance
programme.desc: Lukas, a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge, forming an unlikely trio with a majestic dragon and a swashbuckling, sword-fighting mercenary, Darius. Helena Bonham Carter voices Siveth, the ice breathing dragon who was once banished from the kingdom for failing to save the king's life. Compelled by the young man's cause, she emerges from hiding, using her fantastical powers on the trio's adventurous journey which brings revelations and rewards beyond vengeance. Dragonheart: Vengeance is an exciting action-adventure filled with fantasy and humor that will thrill the entire family.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Before there was Amityville, there was Harrisville. This film tells the true story of Ed and Lorraine Warren, world-renowned paranormal investigators, who were called to help a family terrorised by a dark presence in a secluded farmhouse. Forced to confront a powerful demonic entity, the Warrens find themselves caught in the most horrifying case of their lives.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: The world's hunger for extreme sports and reality competitions has grown into reality TV bloodlust. Now, the most extreme racing competition has emerged and its contestants are murderous prisoners. The rules of the Death Race are simple: win five events and you're set free. Lose and you're road kill splashed across the Internet.

programme.title: Death Race
programme.desc: The world's hunger for extreme sports and reality competitions has grown into reality TV bloodlust. Now, the most extreme racing competition has emerged and its contestants are murderous prisoners. The rules of the Death Race are simple: win five events and you're set free. programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A deep-sea submersible part of an international undersea observation program has been attacked by a massive creature, previously thought to be extinct, and now lies disabled at the bottom of the deepest trench in the Pacific with its crew trapped inside. With time running out, expert deep sea rescue diver Jonas Taylor is recruited by a visionary Chinese oceanographer, against the wishes of his daughter Suyin, to save the crew and the ocean itself from this unstoppable threat: a pre-historic 75-foot-long shark known as the Megalodon. What no one could have imagined is that, years before, Taylor had encountered this same terrifying creature. Now, teamed with Suyin, he must confront his fears and risk his own life to save everyone trapped below bringing him face to face once more with the greatest and largest predator of all time.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: This is the story of a US Navy captain and his crew. They are just beginning to enjoy 48 hours of leave when they receive word to immediately return to duty. On a top-secret assignment, they must disguise themselves as Nazis and infiltrate a severely damaged Nazi U-boat. Once on board, they are to steal the Nazi's top-secret decoding device and sink the sub before the Germans catch on to what's really happening. Their mission is more dangerous and frightening than anything they could have ever imagined, but one which has the power to turn the tide of battle.

programme.title: U-571

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2: The Enfield Poltergeist
programme.desc: The supernatural demonologists must travel to London to help a single mother and her four children when their house is plagued by malicious spirits.

programme.title: Wonder Woman (2017)
programme.desc: Before she was Wonder Woman, she was Diana, princess of the Amazons, trained to be an unconquerable warrior. Raised on a sheltered island paradise, when an American pilot crashes on their shores and tells of a massive conflict raging in the outside world, Diana leaves her home, convinced she can stop the threat. Fighting alongside man in a war to end all wars, Diana will discover her full powers and her true destiny.

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: As life on Earth grinds to a halt, a team of explorers and astronauts travel through a wormhole and across the galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: The Shallows
programme.desc: When a surfer is attacked by a great white shark 20 yards from shore, her short journey back to safety becomes the ultimate contest of wills.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
programme.desc: Based on the hit '90s animation, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles are back and have teamed up with news reporter April O'Neill to save New York City from the evil Shredder.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: Roland and the Man in Black share an ancient vendetta: they must fight to the death in an epic battle over the fate of the universe. The last Gunslinger, Roland Deschain has been locked in an eternal battle with Walter O'Dim, also known as the Man in Black, determined to prevent him from toppling the Dark Tower, which holds the universe together. With the fate of the worlds at stake, good and evil will collide in the ultimate battle as only Roland can defend the Tower from the Man in Black.

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: Left for dead after clashing with notorious Mexican drug kingpin Torrez, Machete has escaped to Texas, looking to disappear and forget his tragic past. What he finds is a web of corruption and deceit that leaves a bullet in a senator and Machete a wanted man. Machete sets out to clear his name and expose a deep conspiracy. But standing in his way are a ruthless businessman with an endless payroll of killers, a twisted border vigilante leading a small army, and a beautiful Immigration officer torn between enforcing the law and doing what is right.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: When an attempt to take down a drug cartel blows up in their faces, two undercover operatives are forced to go on the run together, though neither knows that the other is a federal agent. Suddenly, everyone on both sides of the law wants them dead, and their only hope is to trust each other.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: In this sly satire, a group of elites gather to hunt ordinary Americans for sport. But one of The Hunted fights back against The Hunters' leader.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two Miami cops must find $100 million in stolen heroin before their department is shut down. With time running out, detectives Burnett and Lowrey track a master thief into the Miami underworld, dodging bullets and bad guys along the way. A sexy witness can identify the suspect, but a mix-up causes her to believe Burnett is Lowrey, forcing the partners to switch identities. Now, between shoot-outs and car chases, married man Burnett has to stick close to their only witness, while playboy Lowrey goes home to his partner's wife and kids to learn the joys of parenthood - the hard way.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: A socially-conscious horror film set along the Northern California coastline. The original thriller follows Adelaide, her husband Gabe, and their two children, on a summer getaway that takes a nightmarish turn when they encounter terrifying doppelgangers of themselves.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Blamed for the terrorist bombing of the Kremlin, IMF operative Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is disavowed along with the rest of the agency when the President initiates 'Ghost Protocol'. Left without any resources or backup, Ethan must find a way to clear his agency's name and prevent another attack. To complicate matters further, Ethan is forced to embark on this mission with a team of fellow IMF fugitives whose personal motives he does not fully know.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: The web-spinning superhero must battle his own demons and a barrage of new villains including Sandman and Venom.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne is racing to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by the very organisation that hired him.

programme.title: Spider-Man
programme.desc: After a radioactive spider bite, a nerdy teen develops keen senses and amazing strength.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels set out to bring down the bad guys. But a revelation makes the Angels targets for assassination.

programme.title: Bad Boys 2
programme.desc: Burnett and Lowrey reunite as out-of-control, trash-talking cops. Bullets fly, cars crash, and laughs explode as they pursue a whacked-out drug lord from the streets of Miami to the barrios of Cuba.

programme.title: The Mummy (1999)
programme.desc: Archaeologists awaken an Egyptian priest mummified alive 36 centuries ago for killing Pharaoh Seti and sleeping with his mistress. When he escapes from the tomb, he becomes a threat to the world.

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Legendary monster hunter Van Helsing must rely on the help of the beautiful and mysterious Anna Valeris as he engages in an epic battle with the ultimate forces of darkness.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: A documentary film crew, headed by anthropologist Steve Cale and director Terri Flores, ventures into the world's most isolated jungle - the Amazon - in search of a lost and forgotten civilisation. Early in their journey, they come to the aid of Paul Serone, a Paraguayan guide, who joins their expedition. But Serone is actually a poacher on the trail of a legendary snake. When Serone hijacks the boat and its crew on his quest to track and kill the giant snake, he steers the expedition right into the path of the deadly monster.

programme.title: Anaconda

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Before Blade's mother gave birth to him, she was bitten by a vampire, which made Blade immune to vampires. Now a vampire hunter, Blade, joined by vampire detective Hannibal King and Dracula-descendent Frank Drake, slay vampires.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novitiate on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together they uncover the order's unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of the same demonic nun that first terrorised audiences in "The Conjuring 2" as the abbey becomes a horrific battleground between the living and the damned.

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: A story where an ordinary New York teenager and rabid comic book geek dons a green and yellow wetsuit to become the no-nonsense vigilante, Kick-Ass. The eager young hero quickly becomes a phenomenon, capturing the imagination of the public. He's not the only superhero out there. A fearless father-daughter crime-fighting duo, Big Daddy and Hit Girl, have been slowly but surely taking down the criminal empire of local Mafioso, Frank D'Amico.

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
programme.desc: Hunting a terrorist who has destroyed most of the fleet, the crew of the Enterprise must take a leap into unknown territory where loyalties will be tested and ultimate sacrifices made.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: A spacecraft transporting thousands of people to a distant planet has a malfunction in its sleep chambers, and as a result two passengers are awakened 90 years too early.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: A fast paced, edge of your seat thrill ride. FBI agent Flynn is on a mission: transport a federally protected witness from Hawaii to Los Angeles so the government can put a brutal mob boss behind bars. But, just as the plane reached 30,000 feet, hundreds of venomous snakes are unleashed, causing violent mayhem as the vicious predators attack everyone in sight. With the help of L.A.'s leading snake expert on the ground, Flynn leads the other passengers on a desperate, action-packed fight for their lives.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Fearing that the actions of the Man of Steel are left unchecked, Batman takes on Superman, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The re-resurrected mummy of an Egyptian high priest kidnaps the son of archaeologists who first dug him up, and sets out to destroy mankind by commanding the army of the ancient Scorpion King.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A Harvard professor implicated in a murder must unravel an ancient code to expose the greatest conspiracy in history.

programme.title: Troy

programme.title: F9: The Fast Saga
programme.desc: The true meaning of family gets tested like never before as Dom Toretto takes the team on a worldwide ride with high-stakes action, old friends and a surprising new foe.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Supervillains Harley Quinn, Bloodsport, Peacemaker and a collection of nutty cons at Belle Reve prison join the super-secret Task Force X as they're dropped off at a remote, enemy-infused island.

programme.title: Escape Plan: The Extractors
programme.desc: As Ray Breslin and his team of elite security specialists seek out the man responsible for building the prison from the second film, they learn that Rays former partner, John Gage, has been captured. The team assemble once more to stage a recovery, heading to Abaza Prison, also known as Devil's Station, in Eastern Europe where they battle old foe Trevaine and his team of mercs.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 7
programme.desc: The lead-footed crew reunites in this turbo-fuelled tale of the vengeful brother of an international terrorist who sets his bloody sights on the boy racers that took his sibling down.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: This spectacular adventure pits Godzilla, the world's famous monster, against malevolent creatures that, bolstered by humanity's scientific arrogance, threaten our very existence.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 5
programme.desc: In this reunion of the fast and the furious, the speedsters are off to Brazil to attempt to defeat a corrupt businessman who wants them all wiped out.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Special Agent Ethan Hunt teams up with the villain's ex-girlfriend to destroy an international conspiracy to sell a deadly virus to the highest bidder.

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Before Blade's mother gave birth to him, she was bitten by a vampire, which made Blade immune to vampires. Now a vampire hunter, Blade, joined by vampire detective Hannibal King and Dracula-descendent Frank Drake, slay vampires.

programme.title: Death Race 4: Beyond Anarchy
programme.desc: Danny Trejo returns as the ruthless bookie, Goldberg, in the wildest, bloodiest, Death Race ever. After a failed attack on inmate and legendary driver, Frankenstein, Black Ops specialist Connor Gibson (Zach McGowan) infiltrates a super-maximum federal prison with one goal - enter the immoral and illegal Death Race and take Frankenstein down. Connor enlists the help of Baltimore Bob (Danny Glover) and Lists (Fred Koehler), and unexpectedly falls in love with bartending beauty Jane (Christine Marzano). Connor will have to fight for more than his life in this brutal world of no guards, no rules, no track, and no fear.

programme.title: Wrath of Man
programme.desc: Mysterious and wild-eyed, a new security guard for a cash truck company surprises his co-workers when he unleashes precision skills during a heist. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman's ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: This is the story of a US Navy captain and his crew. They are just beginning to enjoy 48 hours of leave when they receive word to immediately return to duty. On a top-secret assignment, they must disguise themselves as Nazis and infiltrate a severely damaged Nazi U-boat. Once on board, they are to steal the Nazi's top-secret decoding device and sink the sub before the Germans catch on to what's really happening. Their mission is more dangerous and frightening than anything they could have ever imagined, but one which has the power to turn the tide of battle.

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: This is the story of a US Navy captain and his crew. They are just beginning to enjoy 48 hours of leave when they receive word to immediately return to duty. On a top-secret assignment, they must disguise themselves as Nazis and infiltrate a severely damaged Nazi U-boat. Once on board, they are to steal the Nazi's top-secret decoding device and sink the sub before the Germans catch on to what's really happening. Their mission is more dangerous and frightening than anything they could have ever imagined, but one which has the power to turn the tide of battle.

programme.title: Interstellar
programme.desc: As life on Earth grinds to a halt, a team of explorers and astronauts travel through a wormhole and across the galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: Cybertron has fallen. When Optimus Prime sends Bumblebee to protect Earth, he begins his journey to become the hero the Universe needs. Crash landing, with no memory of his past, Bumblebee takes refuge in a junkyard disguised as a VW Beetle. Charlie (Hailee Steinfeld), a teenager trying to find her place in the world, discovers and repairs the battle-scarred robot. When the Decepticons forge an alliance with a secret agency led by Agent Burns (John Cena) to hunt down the remaining Autobots, Bumblebee and Charlie team up to protect the world in an action-packed adventure filled with humour and heart that's fun for the whole family.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: An event from Earth's past threatens to ignite a war so big that the Transformers alone will not be able to save the planet.

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: It has been eight years since Batman vanished into the night, turning, in that instant, from hero to fugitive. Assuming the blame for the death of DA Harvey Dent, the Dark Knight sacrificed everything for what he and Commissioner Gordon both hoped was the greater good. For a time the lie worked, as criminal activity in Gotham City was crushed under the weight of the anti-crime Dent Act. Everything will change with the arrival of a cunning cat burglar with a mysterious agenda. Far more dangerous, however, is the emergence of Bane, a masked terrorist whose ruthless plans for Gotham drive Bruce out of his self-imposed exile. Even if he dons the cape and cowl again, Batman may be no match for Bane.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt must bring down a ruthless villain and rescue his fiancee.

programme.title: Cold Pursuit
programme.desc: Welcome to Kehoe, it's -10 degrees and counting at this glitzy ski resort in the Rocky Mountains. The local police aren't used to much action until the son of unassuming town snowplough driver, Nels Coxman, is murdered at the order of Viking, a flamboyant drug lord. Fuelled by rage and armed with heavy machinery, Nels sets out to dismantle the cartel one man at a time, but his understanding of murder comes mainly from what he read in a crime novel. As the bodies pile up, his actions ignite a turf war between Viking and his long-standing rival White Bull, a soulful Native-American mafia boss, that will quickly escalate and turn the small town's bright white slopes blood-red.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A French drug kingpin offers a huge reward to anyone who can break him out of jail and only the LAPD's Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: Undercover FBI agent Frank Castle (Thomas Jane) is crushed when his wife and children are killed after accidentally witnessing a mafia hit. With nothing left to lose or to live for, Castle becomes 'The Punisher' a one-man judge, jury and executioner who declares open season on criminals throughout America. Based on the Marvel Comics character, the film also stars John Travolta, Laura Harring, Samantha Mathis and Rebecca Romijn.

programme.title: Doom
programme.desc: A frantic call for help from a remote research station on Mars sends a team of mercenary Marines into action.

programme.title: King Kong (2005)
programme.desc: The leading lady in a movie is abducted as a sacrifice for a giant ape in this jaw-dropping, triple Oscar-winning remake of the 1933 classic.

programme.desc: A crashlanding puts a father and son on a dangerous planet - Earth. Hunted by an alien and by evolved animal species, the pair must work together to survive.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: June 4, 1944: Uppottery, England. After high winds and poor visibility postpone the Allied invasion of Normandy, Lts Richard Winters and Lewis Nixon reflect on the events that led them to the brink of D-Day.

programme.title: Band of Brothers
programme.desc: It is two years earlier: in Camp Toccoa, GA, volunteers train for America's new military experiment, the paratroops. Theirs is one of nine companies in the 506th Parachute Infantry Regiment: E, aka Easy Company, commanded by the domineering Lt. Herbert Sobel. Through a regimen that involves frequent six-mile climbs up and down Currahee, a local mountain, Sobel succeeds in drilling the men into an elite unit. But his heavy-handed tactics, punishments for petty or imagined infractions, and strategic failures during manoeuvres, alienate Sobel from his men, who prefer his cool-headed second-in-command, Lt. Winters. After the 506th is shipped to England to complete training, Sobel harasses Winters by citing him for failing to inspect a latrine on time. When Winters requests a trial by court-martial, six of his sergeants: Salty Harris, Chuck Grant, Bill Guarnere, Carwood Lipton, Mike Ranney and Floyd Talbert request transfer rather than follow Sobel into combat.

programme.desc: A twist of fate sends a down-and-out tennis player with a ranking of 119 off to Wimbledon for his last chance of winning the men's singles title and the heart of the star 'bad girl' of tennis.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Kate is a successful career woman who wants something more, a baby. But she gets more than she bargained for when she hires Angie, a free spirit, to be her surrogate in a hysterical mama match-up.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: After a freak accident, struggling singer-songwriter Jack realises he's the only person on Earth who remembers The Beatles. Performing their classics, he skyrockets to fame.

programme.title: Playing Cupid
programme.desc: A girl sets her single father up with her teacher after starting a matchmaking business for a school project.

programme.title: Red Riding Hood
programme.desc: Panic grips a village when a werewolf kills the older sister of Valerie. Valerie finds she has unique connection to the beast that draws them together, making her both suspect and bait.

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A hopelessly single TV producer is in for a rude awakening when a chauvinistic shock jock takes over as host of her poorly rating show.

programme.title: Something New
programme.desc: A corporate lawyer finds love in the most unexpected place when she agrees to go on a blind date with a sexy and free-spirited landscaper.

programme.title: Honey: Rise Up And Dance
programme.desc: Aspiring street dancer Skyler is at a major crossroads in her life. She's decided to try out for the same dance crew as her formally trained sister Tosha in order to compete for a college scholarship, but is discouraged by her family and boyfriend who doubt that her raw, edgy talent is enough for her to win. Determined to prove them all wrong, Skyler practices non-stop in Atlanta's underground dance scene and catches the eye of Tyrell. He helps her take her sexy dance and hip-hop battle skills to the next level in order to achieve her dreams.

programme.title: Monster-In-Law
programme.desc: Charlotte finally finds the man of her dreams only to discover that his mother is the woman of her nightmares.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: Jules realises she's in love with her best friend, who's about to marry someone else. She'll do anything to steal him away, except tell him the truth.

programme.title: Made of Honour
programme.desc: Hannah surprises Tom, her best friend who is secretly in love with her, with the news of her engagement. Things take a complicated turn when she asks Tom to be her maid of honour.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: In this third instalment, Bridget's single life and career is interrupted when she finds herself pregnant and unable to identify her baby's father.

programme.title: Detective Pikachu
programme.desc: The world of Pokemon comes to life! The story begins when ace detective Harry Goodman goes mysteriously missing, prompting his 21-year-old son Tim to find out what happened. Aiding in the investigation is Harry's former Pokemon partner, Detective Pikachu: a hilariously wise-cracking, adorable super-sleuth who is a puzzlement even to himself. Finding that they are uniquely equipped to communicate with one another, Tim and Pikachu join forces on a thrilling adventure to unravel the tangled mystery. Chasing clues together through the neon-lit streets of Ryme City - a sprawling, modern metropolis where humans and Pokemon live side by side in a hyper-realistic live-action world - they encounter a diverse cast of Pokemon characters and uncover a shocking plot that could destroy this peaceful co-existence and threaten the whole Pokemon universe.

programme.desc: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, things are about to take a turn for the worse.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Evil wizard Gargamel creates a couple of mischievous Smurf-like creatures called the Naughties hoping they will let him harness the magical Smurf-essence. However, he soon discovers that he needs the help of Smurfette, who knows the secret to turning the Naughties into real Smurfs. When Gargamel and his Naughties kidnap Smurfette from Smurf Village and bring her to Paris, it's up to Papa, Clumsy, Grouchy and Vanity to reunite with their human friends, Patrick and Grace Winslow, and rescue her!

programme.title: The Swan Princess: A Royal Wedding
programme.desc: Join Princess Odette, Prince Derek and their royal friends as they set sail for another magical adventure in the enchanted land of Cathay.

programme.title: Dora Saves the Mermaids
programme.desc: Dora and Boots need your help to save Mermaid Kingdom from a mean, garbage-dumping Octopus by bringing a magical mermaid crown back to Mariana the Mermaid. But how will Dora get to Mermaid Kingdom?

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: For the first time, SpongeBob SquarePants, the world's favourite sea-dwelling invertebrate, comes ashore to our world for his most super-heroic adventure yet. Life in Bikini Bottom couldn't be better for eternal optimist SpongeBob and his friends: loyal starfish Patrick, the sardonic Squidward, scientist squirrel Sandy and crustacean capitalist, Mr Krabs When the top secret recipe for Krabby Patties is stolen, eternal adversaries SpongeBob and Plankton must join forces on a trip through time and space to harness their internal superpowers and battle fiendish pirate Burger with his own plans for the delicious delicacies.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman
programme.desc: Mr Peabody, the most accomplished dog in the world, and his mischievous boy Sherman, use their time machine - the WABAC - to go on the most outrageous adventures known to man or dog. But when Sherman takes the WABAC out for a joyride to impress his friend Penny, they accidentally rip a hole in the universe, wreaking havoc on the most important events in world history. Before they forever alter the past, present and future, Mr Peabody must come to their rescue, ultimately facing the most daunting challenge of any era: figuring out how to be a parent. Together, the time traveling trio will make their mark on history.

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: After discovering an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new types of dragons, Hiccup and Toothless find themselves at the centre of a battle to prevent a costly war across their land.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: The flightless angry birds and the scheming green piggies take their beef to the next level in The Angry Birds Movie 2! When a new threat emerges that puts both Bird and Pig Island in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb, and Mighty Eagle recruit Chuck's sister Silver and team up with pigs Leonard, his assistant Courtney, and techpig Garry to forge an unsteady truce and form an unlikely super-team to save their homes.

programme.title: Nanny McPhee & The Big Bang
programme.desc: Nanny McPhee appears at the door of a stressed young mother, who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war. But once she's arrived, Nanny McPhee discovers that the children are fighting a war of their own against two spoiled city cousins who have just moved in and refuse to leave.

programme.desc: An evil tech genius threatens to turn the city into a metaverse simulation, leaving the Combat Wombat to save the day.

programme.title: Dr. Seuss' The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: The Cat in the Hat who goes by that name is played by Mike Myers of comedy fame! It starts with two kids on a cold, cold wet day their mum is at work and they've no games to play! Then in walks the fun in the form of a Cat who pulls out the laughs from the brim of his hat. Things really get wild when the Cat and his crew (who go by the name of Thing One and Thing Two) take over the house of Conrad and Sally in this fine family film that's right up your alley!

The monsters are all having a great time, indulging in all of the shipboard fun the cruise has to offer, from monster volleyball to colossus sized buffets and exotic excursions, but then the unexpected happens as Drac falls for the intriguing-yet-dangerous captain of the ship. Balancing family, friends, and a budding romance might just be too much, even for the most powerful vampire.

Her tough leadership and compassion would ultimately decide the fate of her nation and leave her with a controversial legacy around the world.

She must learn to stay true to herself while navigating the most cut throat jungle of all: high school.

After years of suppressed rage, Kid discovers a way to infiltrate the enclave of the city's sinister elite. As his childhood trauma boils over, his mysteriously scarred hands unleash an explosive campaign of retribution to settle the score with the men who took everything from him.

Once they become stranded in raging rapids, the thrill-seeking trip quickly turns from exciting to utterly terrifying as the rafters are trapped in a desperate fight for their lives, all while someone seems intent on sabotage to ensure shocking secrets stay buried. To survive the wild river, Joey will have to face her fears, and everyone will have to develop killer instincts before they're torn apart by deception aboard the raft, or by deadly waters wreaking havoc all around them.

It will take the power of sisterhood to find their voice and see what it takes to be the world's top pitches!

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A fast talking con-artist Rayford Gibson and conservative bank teller Claude Banks are accidently teamed up to become the funniest odd couple east of the Mississippi. In an effort to pay off Ray's debt and restore Claude's reputation, they travel south on a bootlegging run for some quick cash. There is no limit to their comical misfortune as they are placed at the scene of a crime and their mistaken identity lands them right in the front of the judge. The hysterical comedy gives a whole new meaning to friends for life.
